Australia Post
We've received your payment details
Hi {!Compensation__c.ContactFirstName__c},
Thanks for providing your payment details for case number: {!Compensation__c.Case_Number__c}
We're sending compensation for the value of {!Compensation__c.Total_Compensation_Amount__c}.
We're sending compensation for the value of {!Compensation__c.Total_Compensation_Amount__c} for your item with tracking number {!Compensation__c.Tracking_Number__c}.
What happens from here?
We'll process the compensation payment. Once the process is complete, we'll close your enquiry.
You'll receive the payment within 5 business days, depending on the destination bank's processing times.
If this compensation is for a late or missing item, it's possible that your item may still show up. If the item gets delivered after the compensation has been paid, it can be kept. No need to pay us back or open another case.
This email has been auto generated by an unmanned inbox, if additional assistance is required, please respond to the original e-mail thread with your Australia Post representative.
Thanks, AusPost Customer Services
